entry.title: The Most Precious Thing
entry.summary:
Author: feelmyheartbeat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,820Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 40

Summary: At last, a signal, except Damian had reported that there were hostiles too close to their position for them to safely continue on and Tim staggered, barely catching himself on a wall. Dick whipped around to him but Tim couldn’t even wave him off, too busy trying to keep himself from throwing up as the pressure built to outright pain. He forced himself to suck in a breath but the cramp only worsened, rippling across his swollen belly and he bit his lip so damn hard he almost expected blood. A hand came to his elbow but Tim was all at once able to stand on his own strength again, the pressure and the pain alike finally gone. Tim straightened further, realising three sets of eyes were trained on him. He glared, then glared harder as the weight of his belly made him slouch again as the strain on his back got too much. Rubbing a hand against his abdomen to try to soothe the little girl, he was swiftly rewarded with a kick to his rib but he bit his lip really really hard so that not a single one of his brothers would ever know.

entry.title: [Podfic] One Step to Survival
entry.summary:
Author: PolynomialPandemic

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 20

Summary: “You can’t fight me!” Tim said before he could stop himself. Actually, this wasn’t a bad idea. Call it cowardly, but it was better than maybe dying, no matter how Hood treated kids in his territory. "Oh, yeah? Why not, Replacement? Aren’t you meant to be a target?” Hood just shoved his forearm against him harder. Tim wheezed, but he managed to talk. This was it. This had better work. “I’m on my period!"   Tim has quickly realized that this fight is not going in his favor. Luckily, he has one more trick up his sleeve.Podfic of One Step to Survival by timbitsandpieces.
